meanings.definition: The quality or state of being manifold.
meanings.sent1: The manifoldness of colors in the painting was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the manifoldness of options available at the buffet.
meanings.sent3: The party planner was overwhelmed by the manifoldness of decoration choices.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a garden of manifoldness, each thought a different flower.
meanings.sent5: The manifoldness of stars in the night sky left him in awe.

meanings.definition: A large or varied number or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The manifoldness of books in the library was impressive.
meanings.sent2: They were amazed by the manifoldness of flavors in the ice cream shop.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out a hat with a manifoldness of rabbits inside.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a place of manifoldness, with different animals living together.
meanings.sent5: The manifoldness of keys on the keychain made it hard to find the right one.
